parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ASM instance.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the ASM instances.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to `servicemesh`.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. A maximum of 20 tags are supported.
